tier.item: (21) Mønyº xarødº myuh tyu-dºm. xardº-xøna soldatº ngamdyowiº. Nenets
I hous e i n entered-1SG house-LOC soldier sat.NARR.3SG
t hi s soldier-DAT soldier-DAT.1SG came.1SG gun-1SG raise-1SG
I entered the house. There was a soldier sitting in the house. I came to this soldier and
raised my gun. The soldier got frightened (literally: the soldier's heart went).
